lines.text: Now, Lieutenant, you don't really think that Beth killed her brother in cold blood, now do you?
Well, as a matter of fact... I do.
Uh, my name is Columbo, ma'am. I'm a, uh... lieutenant, uh, from the police.
Dah, just a minute. Not so quickly. I'd like to look that over.
Well, I must say, you hardly look the role.
This is a terrible thing to admit, but, uh... I think that, in a way, her brother's death is the best thing that ever happened to her.
Uh... Well, the fragrance is not, um... compatible.
That's a shame. I just lit it.
Well, if I've changed, it's because I thought you'd like a more exciting woman.
A change, yes, but a complete metamorphosis? I'm not sure, Beth, you're the same person.
...I won't be a hypocrite, Lieutenant. I'm sorry about poor Bryce being killed, but it has gotten Beth out from under his thumb.
Oh, yeah, yeah... Way out! Huh?
Suppose you ask the question that you haven't asked.
